- **Viruses and malware:** Cracks and hacks are often infected with viruses and malware that can damage your computer system, steal your personal information, or hijack your online accounts. Some malware can even encrypt your files and demand a ransom to restore them.

- **No updates:** Cracks and hacks are not updated by the software developers. This means that you will miss out on the latest features, improvements, and bug fixes that the software offers. You will also not be able to access the online services or resources that the software provides.
